item.title: Little down Shakespeare Road from the junction of Goldsmith to PE way, 23rd January
item.description:

item.title: Inadequate lighting provision on Northfield Terrace, 21st January
item.description:
There are two streetlights along the length of the Terrace, neither of which provide enough light for residents to safely navigate the street. Combined with potholes, densely-parked cars, drains and litter in the road, it is challenging at night for pedestrians to use the footpath. Please might it be possible for the lighting along the Terrace to be supplemented with a third street lamp installed for continual illumination? Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Clarence Square, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
